longBusinessSummary: Yatharth Hospital & Trauma Care Services Limited owns and operates super-specialty hospitals in Delhi and Madhya Pradesh. The company offers services in the areas of gynecology; gastroenterology; pulmonology; pediatric; nephrology and urology; cardiology; orthopedics and spine and rheumatology; neurosciences; medicine; general surgery; ENT; physiotherapy and rehabilitation; interventional spine and pain medicine; nutrition and health; pathology and laboratory medicine; dentistry; ophthalmology; dermatology; anesthesiology; radiology; and psychology and psychiatry. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Noida, India.
